Meditation is practiced to reap a variety of benefits: to increase calmness of the 
mind, to promote physical relaxation, to improve psychological balance, to cope 
with the stress of illness, or to improve overall health and well-being. Through regular practice, one acquires the power to concentrate deeply. Such enhanced concentration results in many benefits such as increased physical energy, mental 
efficiency, creativity, calmness, memory, intellect, psychic power and intuitiveness.
